GDSiteIntro.title: GDIntro
GDSiteIntro.callout: Scroll Down To See My Portfolio
GDSiteIntro.codingThisSite:
This site is built mostly with Javascript code. Content are supplied from a JSON files. It's an experiment I wanted to do, to practice the new ES6.
The following libraries are used: jquery, bootstrap, youTube api and tweenmax for animation. Running on node.js, webpack modules, and babel transpiler. CSS are written in Sass SCSS. Here's a link to my github repo.
